definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of

sentences.english: Normal breathing is accomplished by contracting the dome-shaped diaphragm downward into a flat shape.
sentences.chinese: 顶状的横隔膜向下压缩成水平状来完成的。

sentences.english: Practice through horizontal movement of the diaphragm to breath for the completion of abdominal breathing.
sentences.chinese: 练功中通过横隔肌的运动来完成的呼吸为腹式呼吸。

sentences.english: Often times the footnotes may dictate the design of the diaphragm.
sentences.chinese: 很多时候脚注决定了横隔的设计。

sentences.english: Three thousand miles of ocean lie between you and them.
sentences.chinese: 你们和他们之间横隔着三千海里大洋。

sentences.english: Section 21 below explains how to use the diaphragm to breathe properly.
sentences.chinese: 后面在21节中解释了如何使用横隔膜正确的呼吸。

sentences.english: Switching to diaphragmatic breathing takes concentrated practice.
sentences.chinese: 转变为横隔膜呼吸需要全神贯注的练习。

sentences.english: These fungi are septate with simple pores in their cross-walls.
sentences.chinese: 这些真菌在它们的横壁中是具简单孔的横隔膜的。

sentences.english: Ralph grasped the idea and hit the shell with air from his diaphragm.
sentences.chinese: 拉尔夫抓住了要领，运用横隔膜的气往贝壳里猛送。

sentences.english: Simultaneously the region of the perineum is contracted and pulled up towards the diaphragm.
sentences.chinese: 会阴区域收缩的同时向横隔膜方向提拉。

sentences.english: With the X-frames projecting into the boxes, the transverse diaphragms were formed.
sentences.chinese: 把这些X框架放进这些箱体，就成了横隔梁。

definition: mediastinum (organs and tissues in the thorax between the lungs)
to cross (a road, an ocean etc)/to cut across
Houpi township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
